verbose_text: Furthermore, we found that following exposure to OGD or H 2 O 2, the knockdown of Srxn1 resulted in a decrease in mitochondrial transmembrane potential (Deltapsi m) as indicated by JC-1 staining, an increase in the cytoplasmic expression of cytochrome c (Cyt.C), caspase-3, caspase-9, poly (ADP-ribose) polymerase (PARP) and Bax protein at the protein level, but a decrease in the expression of the anti-apoptotic Bcl-2 protein; these effects were tightly associated with the mitochondrial apoptotic pathway.
evidence: expression of cytochrome c (Cyt.C), caspase-3, caspase-9, poly(ADP-ribose) polymerase (PARP
